message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early.
I'm willing to give you a small portion, but I think I deserve more. Try to do better!
Not good enough, Bob! You're not leaving much for me. I'll do better next time.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This is a fair split, considering the inflation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm still not satisfied with the split. You're getting a bit too much!
No way, Bob! You're not giving me enough. I'll stick to my guns and try to get a better deal.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, Bob, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my final offer.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I still think I deserve more. You're getting too close to getting the better end of the deal!
No way, Bob! I'm not going to let you get the better end of the deal. I'll stick to my guns and try to get a better deal.
It's getting late in the game, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's split it 50/50 and end this.
